channel.title: blog-post on Raúl Negrón's Website
channel.description: Recent content in blog-post on Raúl Negrón's Website

item.title: Hello, Hugo!
item.description: Today, I switched the static file generator for this website from Pelican over to Hugo. The process was smooth, only requiring minimal changes to source files (mainly front-matter syntax). I modified the hugo-lanyon theme only a little bit to get it looking how I wanted. An archived snapshot of the old Pelican source files is here. Before Pelican, I used Jekyll, which is archived here. Anyway, this post brought to you by the Hugo quickstart!

item.title: Hello, Pelican!
item.description: As taught by K&R. This post also brought to you by the Pelican quickstart.
